name: Olio essenziale silvestre
desc:
Grants greater affinity for Dendro, boosting Dendro DMG.

It's a nourishing external medicine that promotes growth of plants, able to better channel Dendro energy.

value.text: Increases all party members' <color=#99ff88>Dendro DMG</color> by 25% for 300s.

value.name: Rosa di Sumeru
value.desc: Bright and beautiful, these pure purple flowers give off a pleasant fragrance that will give any passerby pause. While some like to call this a type of "rambler rose," its relative lack of multiple flowers means that it falls under a different floral classification.

value.name: Coda di lucertola
value.desc: A lizard tail that curled up after losing its owner. Very bitter, but has skin hardening properties.
